name: Into The Grinder
description:
Into the Grinder is a game about collecting robot frames and sending them on to other levels where they can be used again.  The first frame you put into the drop will be the frame you use for the next level.  Choose wisely!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys: Move your robot

Space: Select or interact

Credits:

Created by Chandler Norris in PyGame for OMGJam8

Artwork by @JeromBD on OpenGameArt.org

Music and sound effects from OMGJam8 art assets
